Boots.description:
+25% Attack Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Berserker's Greaves
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and Attack Speed
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25% Attack Speed UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
+15 Magic Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and magic damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +15 Magic Penetration UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''
Boots.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and Cooldown Reduction
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.) ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +40 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes.

Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Sorcery
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily grants Ability Power and Bonus Damage to champions and turrets.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +40 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes. Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+30 Attack Damage
+30 Ability Power
+30% Attack Speed
+10% Critical Strike Chance
+8% Movement Speed
+250 Health
+200 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed instead. This Movement Speed bonus is halved for ranged champions.
UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 200% of base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Trinity Force
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Attack Damage +30 Ability Power +30% Attack Speed +10% Critical Strike Chance +8% Movement Speed +250 Health +200 Mana UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed instead. This Movement Speed bonus is halved for ranged champions. UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 200% of base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+40% Attack Speed
+10% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 8% of the target's current Health in bonus physical damage (max 60 vs. monsters and minions) on hit.
UNIQUE Active: Deals 10% of target champion's maximum Health (min. 100) as physical damage, heals for the same amount, and steals 25% of the target's Movement Speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown).
Endgame Items.name: Blade of the Ruined King
Endgame Items.plaintext: Deals damage based on target's Health, can steal Health and Movement Speed
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +25 Attack Damage +40% Attack Speed +10% Life Steal UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 8% of the target's current Health in bonus physical damage (max 60 vs. monsters and minions) on hit. UNIQUE Active: Deals 10% of target champion's maximum Health (min. 100) as physical damage, heals for the same amount, and steals 25% of the target's Movement Speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown).

Endgame Items.description:
+100 Ability Power
+10% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.
Endgame Items.name: Luden's Echo
Endgame Items.plaintext: Increases Ability Power and Movement Speed
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +100 Ability Power +10% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Ability Power
+1000 Mana
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana.
UNIQUE Active - Mana Shield: Consumes 20% of current Mana to grant a shield for 3 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 150 plus the amount of Mana consumed (120 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Seraph's Embrace
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +1000 Mana +50% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. UNIQUE Active - Mana Shield: Consumes 20% of current Mana to grant a shield for 3 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 150 plus the amount of Mana consumed (120 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Attack Damage
+20% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive: Critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of 200%.
Endgame Items.name: Infinity Edge
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Attack Damage +20% Critical Strike Chance UNIQUE Passive: Critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of 200%.

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+100 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities apply a Movement Speed reduction to enemies based on the spell type:

Single Target: 40% reduction for 1.5 seconds.
Area of Effect: 40% reduction for 1 seconds
Damage over Time or Multi-hit: 20% reduction for 1 seconds.
Summoned Minions: 20% reduction for 1 seconds.

(If a spell fits in more than one category, it uses the weakest slow value.)
Endgame Items.name: Rylai's Crystal Scepter
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +100 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities apply a Movement Speed reduction to enemies based on the spell type: Single Target: 40% reduction for 1.5 seconds. Area of Effect: 40% reduction for 1 seconds Damage over Time or Multi-hit: 20% reduction for 1 seconds. Summoned Minions: 20% reduction for 1 seconds. (If a spell fits in more than one category, it uses the weakest slow value.)

Endgame Items.description:
+40 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: Physical damage ignores 35% of the target's Armor (applies before Armor Penetration).
Endgame Items.name: Last Whisper
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +40 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive: Physical damage ignores 35% of the target's Armor (applies before Armor Penetration).

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown).

At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds.

Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).

Starting Items.description:
+60 Health
+15 Ability Power

Passive: +3 Mana Regen per 5 seconds.
Passive: Restores 4 Mana upon killing a unit.
Starting Items.name: Doran's Ring
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: +60 Health +15 Ability Power Passive: +3 Mana Regen per 5 seconds. Passive: Restores 4 Mana upon killing a unit.

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 5 at one time.

Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.
Starting Items.name: Health Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Consume to restore Health over time
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 5 at one time. Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.
